data.title: SO2 Defence Digital Reserves Augmentation Cell
data.meta_description: Title: SO2 Defence Digital Reserves Augmentation Cell. Recruiting Service: Joint. Region: Gloucestershire. Rank: Lieutenant-Commander, Major, Major (RM), Squadron Leader. Application Deadline:
data.text:
SO2 Defence Digital (DD) Reserves Augmentation Cell will lead with the employment of a Reserve resource, evolving DD into a recognised Regular & Reserve Organisation that will allow DD to employ reservists. They will come from from all 3 Services on full time (FTRS (FC)/(LC)/(HC), mobilisation or part time (ARRG / ADC / VeRR / VTOD) commitments to support short-to-medium term projects and management as well as other specified tasks.

Responsibilities:

Lead with sS Reserve stakeholders, Manning Cells and specialist Reserve units to develop a mutually beneficial working relationship.

Lead the coordination of Reserve Support Requests.

Promote Reserve opportunities through the DD and regional Resettlement processes.

Promote and encourage value for money opportunities by providing short term DD Reserve workforce solutions in support of DD components.

Provide SME career management advice to all RAC Reservists.

Conduct sS Attestations.

Develop & Lead Reserve recruitment & advertising processes.

Lead with resource bids for utilisation of funding.

Essential competencies:

Must be an OF3 of any specialisation. OF2 applicants with a recommend for the next higher rank in their most recent OJAR will be considered.

OF4 applicants, if successful, will only be paid as and wear the rank of OF3.

NSV Security|Security Check|Joint|No

ICSC
